name: Marooned (itch) (brainy)
description:
As a member of the special forces of Colkraz, an alien has to search for the MIA crew of a spaceship stranded on Medeces. Luckily for him, a spirit will aid him on his mission! In this game, you can choose your role: play as the alien on a computer, or as the spirit in your phone!

  • Two different forms of play: do you prefer to do the jumping and the shooting in a computer or aiding your friends in your phone?
  • Explore the world and get new abilities, no matter your role on the game!
  • Different enemies and bosses to fight! Better get ready to coordinate your movements!
  • Infinite two-players fun!

Disclaimer: You need to be two people to play the game, one on a PC and the other on an android device (You can install the APK by clicking at the three vertical points on the package, you'll need to trust third-party apps on your phone). Be sure to select the correct region on the menu. The client (phone) may disconnect from time to time, sorry about that. You can reconnect by restarting the app (on the phone only) and introducing the Game ID again, it'll keep your progress.
